name: Grapes and Raisins in Citrus Juice
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low calorie, low-fat, low sugar, nut-free, dessert, grapes, lemon juice, raisin, sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the lemon juice and sugar in a bowl large enough to hold the fruit.

Wash the grapes and separate them from their stems. Add the grapes and the raisins to the mixture in the bowl, and mix well. Serve immediately, or refrigerate for up to 4 hours before serving in wine glasses.
